meanings.definition: Write (something) again so as to alter or improve it.
meanings.sent1: I had to rewrite my essay to fix the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Authors often rewrite their drafts multiple times before publishing.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken rewrite its own storybook?
meanings.sent4: Her life took a new turn, prompting her to rewrite her future plans.
meanings.sent5: The artist had to rewrite the painting to capture the right emotions.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing that has been rewritten.
meanings.sent1: The rewrite of the article was much clearer than the original.
meanings.sent2: She submitted the rewrite of her short story to the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The rewrite of the play turned it into a comedy instead of a drama.
meanings.sent4: The rewrite of the song gave it a fresh, modern twist.
meanings.sent5: The rewrite of the novel made it a bestseller.
